remarks: The restriction of the category of non-unital rings to the set of unital ring homomorphisms is a category.  (Contributed by AV, 4-Mar-2020.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
rngcrescrhmOLD.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. V ) $.
rngcrescrhmOLD.c $e |- C = ( RngCatOLD ` U ) $.
rngcrescrhmOLD.r $e |- ( ph -> R = ( Ring i^i U ) ) $.
rngcrescrhmOLD.h $e |- H = ( RingHom |` ( R X. R ) ) $.
rhmsubcOLDcat $p |- ( ph -> ( ( RngCatOLD ` U ) |`cat H ) e. Cat ) $.
